description: Reptiles are coldblooded vertebrates with dry, scaled skin. They include lizards, snakes and turtles.
heading: "Squamata","Testudines","Crocodilia","Sphenodonta"
head_description: "A large order of reptiles which are scaled and comprise the snakes, lizards, and worm lizards.","An order of reptiles which comprises the turtles, terrapins, and tortoises. They are distinguished by having a shell of bony plates covered with horny scales, and many kinds are aquatic.","An order of reptiles including the crocodiles, gavials, alligators, and many extinct kinds.","A reptile that is endemic to New Zealand which, resembles most lizards a part of distinct lineage, order Rhynchocephalia."
animation_css: .contentHolder #clip1{width: 5.4%;height: 3.9%;position:absolute;top: 24.4%;left: 35.2%;cursor:pointer;opacity:0.0;z-index: 10;border: 1px solid red;}.contentHolder #clip2{width: 5.8%;height: 3.9%;position:absolute;top: 47.9%;left: 35.2%;cursor:pointer; opacity:0.0;z-index: 10;border: 1px solid red;}.contentHolder #clip3{width: 5.5%;height: 3.8%;position:absolute;top: 81.4%;left: 35.2%;cursor:pointer;opacity:0.0;z-index: 10;border: 1px solid red;}.contentHolder #clip4{width: 7.3%;height: 3.7%;position:absolute;top: 24.4%;left: 54.8%;cursor:pointer;opacity:0.0;z-index: 10;border: 1px solid red;}.contentHolder #clipdummy1{opacity: 0.4;width: 5.5%;height: 2%;position:absolute;top: 26.4%;left: 35.2%;cursor:pointer;background:#FFFF00;display: none;z-index: 2;}.contentHolder #clipdummy2{opacity: 0.4;width: 5.9%;height: 2.1%;position:absolute;top: 49.9%;left: 35.2%;cursor:pointer;background:#FFFF00;display: none;z-index: 2;}.contentHolder #clipdummy3{opacity: 0.4;width: 5.6%;height: 2.1%;position:absolute;top: 81.4%;left: 35.2%;cursor:pointer;background:#FFFF00;display: none;z-index: 2;}.contentHolder #clipdummy4{opacity:  0.4;width: 7.4%;height: 2.2%;position:absolute;top: 26.2%;left: 54.8%;cursor:pointer;background:#FFFF00;display: none;z-index: 2;}.contentHolder .explanationDiv{display: none;width: 15%;height: 13%;position:absolute;top: 4%;left: 43.5%;background:#FFFFC6;border:2px solid #CFCFCF;padding: 0.1%;overflow: auto;z-index: 9999;}
